statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{5 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x - 3 , 10 \, x^{3} - 11 \, x^{2} - 15 \, x + 1 , -2 \, x^{3} + x^{2} + 5 \, x + 1 , 4 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} - x - 2 , 2 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} + 2\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
